page.title: 09PROVINCIAL DAY
page.content: Provincial day is all about churches getting together and enjoying themselves.This year it is on Sunday June 16th.It starts at 12.00 (midday).It is always at Silcoates School.Games are included like 5 aside football some children from the club I go to (Pilots) are in the 5-a-side football.People are welcome to come and watch. Some more of the games are Superstars and flower arranging.Everyboby can join in or watch.My friends in the 5 a side football are Richard Bower,Claire Brandwood ,Simon Brandwood,Corrin,Richard Armitage,Neil Henderson and Ian.These are some subs which means if you want to go off someboby else goes on.Flower arranging is for a older people but anybody can do it.Superstars is different sports together.
